body: You're probably right. I don't have anything periodic building things, but my editor does, and I probably had the XDR package open in the editor at the time. The above error (minus the panic) is trivially reproducible by having an xdr.a file in ~/pkg as it then won't try to build the package from Godeps/_workspace even though that's earlier in GOPATH. I think this is a known limitation with this method of building with dependencies. :/
